<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>inactive</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <plugin id="com.snc.pa.problem.context_sensitive_analytics" name="Performance Analytics - Context Sensitive Analytics for Problem Management" type="feature_set" provider_name="ServiceNow" help="CSHelp:Performance-Analytics-Context-Sensitive-Analytics" state="published" version="1.0.0">
<description>Performance Analytics adding ability to open PA context sensitive PA dashboards in problem form based on UI actions.</description>
<requires> <import plugin="com.snc.pa" /> <import plugin="com.snc.pa.problem" /> </requires>
</plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Performance Analytics adding ability to open PA context sensitive PA dashboards in problem form based on UI actions.</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:Performance-Analytics-Context-Sensitive-Analytics</help> <id>com.snc.pa.problem.context_sensitive_analytics</id> <licensable>false</licensable> <name>Performance Analytics - Context Sensitive Analytics for Problem Management</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.pa.problem.context_sensitive_analytics/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.snc.pa,com.snc.pa.problem</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>blem.context_sensitive_analytics</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>false</trackable> <type>feature_set</type> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
